definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Data analysis was performed with STATA software package.
sentences.chinese: 使用STATA统计软件包进行数据分析。
无法解压缩更新软件包。
和其它APT前端下载的软件包。

sentences.english: Part of a software package that is processor or platform-dependent.
sentences.chinese: 软件包的具有平台依赖性的那一部分。

sentences.english: As packages become more complex, codesign is becoming much more prominent.
sentences.chinese: 作为软件包变得更加复杂，协同变得更加突出。

sentences.english: The meta package definition file points to each application package in the software package.
sentences.chinese: 该元数据包定义文件指向软件包中的各应用程序包。

sentences.english: PVI has developed software packages for many different testing applications.
sentences.chinese: PVI已经为很多不同的测试应用开发了软件包。

sentences.english: A software package contains a collection of actions to be performed on a workstation.
sentences.chinese: 一个软件包包含了一组要在工作站上进行的活动。

sentences.english: Install this package if you need further information on the development process and workings of Aspell.
sentences.chinese: 如需更多信息，请安装这个软件包。

sentences.english: It's most likely you'll need to change the default settings that come with the out-of-the-box package.
sentences.chinese: 您将有可能需要更改现成的软件包的缺省设置。

sentences.english: This icon must match closely the icon provided in the XAP package.
sentences.chinese: 该图标必须严格匹配XAP软件包里提供的图标。

sentences.english: It gives you complete control over the package management of your system.
sentences.chinese: 新立得给予你控制系统软件包管理的能力。

sentences.english: Submit the autobuilt package to LCG.
sentences.chinese: 向LCG提交自动构建的软件包。

sentences.english: This paper presents the design of a CAD software package for digital control systems.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一个数字控制系统计算机辅助设计软件包。

sentences.english: However, the software package block must reside on the source host.
sentences.chinese: 然而，软件包块必须存在于源主机上。

sentences.english: They might require specific software packages, tailored to a sector or problem domain.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能需要针对特定部门或问题领域的软件包。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
